page.title: 12SHOPPING IN SKELMORLIE
page.content: In our area there are three main groups of shops. {Group 1 }Upper Skelmorlie 2 grocers(1 licensed) 1 butcher 1 greengrocer 1 Post Office 1 hairdresser 1 ironmonger {Group 2} Lower Skelmorlie 1 licensed grocer 1 Post Office 1 shoe shop 1 Bank 1 chemist {Group 3} Wemyss Bay 1 grocer 1 butcher 1 newsagent 1 garage {Shop opening times} Monday-Saturday 0830-1800(1 hr lunch) Two shops open on Sunday morning. Most of the shop owners are local and are very helpful.Change comes slowly to Skelmorlie and the local shops weigh in ounces and pounds,while kg. and g.are used in the towns.
